---
title: full_pipeline
---

A pipeline to analyse multiple multiomics samples.

## Argument help

Run the following command to view the workflow's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script ./workflows/multiomics/full_pipeline/main.nf --help
```

### Inputs



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name      |Description         |Attributes                            |
|:---------|:-------------------|:-------------------------------------|
|`--id`    |ID of the sample.   |string, required, example: "foo"      |
|`--input` |Path to the sample. |file, required, example: "input.h5mu" |
:::
